| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1552](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1552 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

**Girtab** is a unique arachnid added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") that appears on her [special level](/wiki/Special_level "Special level"), [The Spider Caves](/wiki/The_Spider_Caves "The Spider Caves"), along with [Shelob](/wiki/Shelob "Shelob"). Essentially a much stronger version of a [giant scorpion](/wiki/Giant_scorpion "Giant scorpion"), she has two claw attacks and a [poisonous](/wiki/Poison "Poison") stinger attack, but no other special abilities.

## Strategy

While poison is likely to be harmless to any character that can reach the Spider Caves, Girtab can still deal 50+ damage/turn in melee. Most characters with even a partially complete [ascension kit](/wiki/Ascension_kit "Ascension kit") will be able to take her down, but those dipping into the Spider Caves for the guaranteed [speed boots](/wiki/Speed_boots "Speed boots") will want to be cautious. Note that Girtab does respect [Elbereth](/wiki/Elbereth "Elbereth") as well as [scrolls of scare monster](/wiki/Scroll_of_scare_monster "Scroll of scare monster").

## Origin

Girtab, meaning "scorpion" in Sumerian, is a name for the binary star Kappa Scorpii. It symbolizes the state of Paraíba on the flag of Brazil.

## Encyclopaedia entry

No entry

Girtab

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
s Girtab
Difficulty 28
Attacks Claw 5d4, Claw 5d4, Sting 3d8 poison
s Girtab
Difficulty 28
Attacks

Claw 5d4, Claw 5d4, Sting 3d8 poison

Base level 22
Base experience 871
Speed 15
Base AC 3
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 500
Nutritional value 150
Size Large
Resistances poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed poison (100%)

Girtab:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is an overlord to its kind.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • cannot be tamed.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1552

Girtab is a unique arachnid added in SLASH'EM that appears on her special level, The Spider Caves, along with Shelob. Essentially a much stronger version of a giant scorpion, she has two claw attacks and a poisonous stinger attack, but no other special abilities.

Strategy

While poison is likely to be harmless to any character that can reach the Spider Caves, Girtab can still deal 50+ damage/turn in melee. Most characters with even a partially complete ascension kit will be able to take her down, but those dipping into the Spider Caves for the guaranteed speed boots will want to be cautious. Note that Girtab does respect Elbereth as well as scrolls of scare monster.

Origin

Girtab, meaning "scorpion" in Sumerian, is a name for the binary star Kappa Scorpii. It symbolizes the state of Paraíba on the flag of Brazil.

'''Girtab''' is a unique arachnid added in [[SLASH'EM]] that appears on her [[special level]], [[The Spider Caves]], along with [[Shelob]].  Essentially a much stronger version of a [[giant scorpion]], she has two claw attacks and a [[poison]]ous stinger attack, but no other special abilities.

==Strategy==

While poison is likely to be harmless to any character that can reach the Spider Caves, Girtab can still deal 50+ damage/turn in melee.  Most characters with even a partially complete [[ascension kit]] will be able to take her down, but those dipping into the Spider Caves for the guaranteed [[speed boots]] will want to be cautious.  Note that Girtab does respect [[Elbereth]] as well as [[scroll of scare monster|scrolls of scare monster]].

==Origin==
Girtab, meaning "scorpion" in Sumerian, is a name for the binary star Kappa Scorpii. It symbolizes the state of Paraíba on the flag of Brazil.
